name: Timothy Todd TERWILLIGER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Terwilliger v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Timothy Todd TERWILLIGER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 16th day of April, 1996, as a direct appeal, the action is quashed; the matter is treated as a petition for allowance of appeal and denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
674 A.2d 672
Timothy Todd TERWILLIGER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 16, 1996.
